price: (40) And We have certainly made the Qur’ān easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
